title: Update Replication wiki page to refer to new replication command names and show how to reach replication admin GUI
description:
Also needs to be beefed up with other info, such as what happens if you shut down during replication. Lucene/Solr will not clean up the files, and they may be very large. We should point users to were these would be located and when/why they would be save/smart to manually remove. 

Currently there are many little details you have to figure out for yourself.

comments.author: Noble Paul
comments.content: the command names are already updated in the wiki

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content:
Ah, I was just looking at snapshoot - didn't notice the rest had been changed. Did we just miss snapshoot then? Its supposed to be backup right?

Force a snapshot on master. This is useful to take periodic backups .command : [WWW] http://master_host:port/solr/replication?command=snapshoot
